page.title: 15Old Forge Stores
page.content: Old Forge Stores (map ref.555.619) is over 100 years old. There used to be a blacksmiths there, but nowadays they sell nearly everything from baby clothes to wine and beer. Things that sell most are drink,bread milk and cigarettes. Milk is delivered to houses in the area. The shop has been changed inside and the windows have been changed too. There are about 300 regular customers. The busiest days are Thursday and Saturday morning.Opening hours are 7a.m. till 9.30 p.m. with half days on Wednesday,Saturday and Sunday.
